update.description:
Two fixes to help with false positives in the gazebo\_ros\_pkgs CI:

* Use COLCON\_IGNORE to avoid uncrustify to check files in that directories
* Back to source setup.bash to after rosdep install so we catch the local\_setup.bash files.

Tested twice:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64&build=15)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_crystal-bionic-amd64/15/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/15/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64&build=14)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_crystal-bionic-amd64/14/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/14/))



In the unstable one there are two tests failing:

* gazebo\_ros `test_node` seems to disappear from execution without given a trace after the message `[INFO] [gazebo_ros_node]: ROS was initialized without arguments.`
* `gazebo_ros_ray_sensor_test`failed with what seems to be an error in the bitness of a null comparison used by gtest ASSERT\_NE\(pc, nullptr\) being pc a point cloud shared pointer `13: Expected: (pc) != (nullptr), actual: 16-byte object <00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00>`
update.title: Ignore build install ament

content.raw: `test_node` also fails on build 16, but ray sensor passes: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/16/
content.html: test_node also fails on build 16, but ray sensor passes: https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/16/

update.description:
Two fixes to help with false positives in the gazebo\_ros\_pkgs CI:

* Use COLCON\_IGNORE to avoid uncrustify to check files in that directories
* Back to source setup.bash to after rosdep install so we catch the local\_setup.bash files.

Tested twice:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64&build=15)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_crystal-bionic-amd64/15/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/15/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64&build=14)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2\_gazebo\_pkgs-ci-default\_crystal-bionic-amd64/14/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros2_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_crystal-bionic-amd64/14/))



In the unstable one there are two tests failing:

* gazebo\_ros `test_node` seems to disappear from execution without given a trace after the message `[INFO] [gazebo_ros_node]: ROS was initialized without arguments.`
* `gazebo_ros_ray_sensor_test`failed with what seems to be an error in the bitness of a null comparison used by gtest ASSERT\_NE\(pc, nullptr\) being pc a point cloud shared pointer `13: Expected: (pc) != (nullptr), actual: 16-byte object <00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00> vs 8-byte object <00-00 00-00 00-00 00-00>`
update.title: Ignore build install ament
